text: Claudia Alvera (born 6 July 1966) is an Italian curler. ==Personal Life== Alvera works as a chef. She is married and has two daughters who curled with her – Giorgia and Federica Apollonio.http.www.curling.ca\fwwcc2016 Her brother is an Italian curler and coach Fabio Alverà. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Italian female curlers Category:People from Cortina d'Ampezzo
title: Claudia Alvera
